short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See immediately which items you are approved to sell in Tactical Arbitrage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See immediately which items you are approved to sell without having to click the check restrictions button on each item in Tactical Arbitrage.  Don't waste time anymore clicking on items that you are not approved to sell.  This is huge especially when you're combing through pages and pages of search results.  What used to take you an hour or more can now be accomplished in minutes.
